altTitles.en: 我真的好喜欢你 老师

description.en:
Daisuki Datta yo, Sensei…  
A girl whom experienced unsuccessful "threads" of love with her teacher, encounters her fated person!?  
  
A very kind, dramatic love!  
  
Includes oneshots:  
Ushiro kara Nibanme no Kanojo  
Yumi loves Sakura and her crush happens to be friends with a guy called Sakura! She only eyes for her sempai, not Sakura, but this changes when she was caught watching Sakura getting slapped by a girl and he called her a peeping tom. He even told her that she "should give up" on her crush, what does he mean by that…?  
  
Toraware Beast (Captured Beast)  
Having just transferred into a new school, Shiori's "experienced" look has given her an opportunity to make friends, but in reality she is not experienced in love at all. To maintain this image, Shiori desperately hides the fact that she is a HUGE book otaku. Meeting another book fan who is a mysterious beauty, Shiori ends up in an unpredicted circumstance. What now will become of Shiori's hope for an elegant school life…?!
description.pt-br: Ito Sakuraba estava deprimida depois de ter terminado com seu professor. Até que encontrou Izumi Nakamura. Ela ficou atraída por ele, mas descobriu que ele também era um professor! Esse relacionamento irá continuar e ela vai confiar nele?
